name: tm91
effect: Teaches Flash Cannon to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Flash Cannon to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black-white: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
